headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Level Up and Earn Triple Rewards in Power Play
content: Classic Adversary Mode Power Play is paying out 3X GTA$ & RP this week, offering all participants the chance to win big in a turbocharged TDM for the ages. Use cutting-edge weaponry and devastating power-ups to crush the opposition across a variety of maps - including the USS Luxington and the Chiliad Missile Silo - to bring home a handsome sum for participating in the bloodbath.
